item.title: Need Help With Help with my 317 Dragon Claw Gfx/Anim
item.dc:creator: @rainingpkz rainingpkz
item.description:
@rainingpkz wrote:

Alright so I got an awesome d claw anim my question is how do I add it yea yea ill get flamed for being a noob but chances are when you first started you couldnt do this either so can anyone help me?

file DL:
http://uppit.com/v/2LBO083C
anim:

Code:
if(j == 1){
int file = 1919;
int[] frames = {75, 75, 62, 62, 93, 93, 93, 82, 82, 82, 57, 57, 71, 71, 71, 66, 66, 66, 66, 61, 61, 92, 92, 92, 73, 73, 73, 65, 65, 65, 89, 89, 70, 70, 70, 81, 81, 81, 67, 67, 84, 84, 84, 59, 59, 59, 63, 63, 63, 99, 99, 99, 78, 78, 78, 69, 69, 69, 96, 96, 96, 96, 74, 74, 74, 74, 79, 79, 79, 90, 90, 90, 94, 94, 58};
aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1];
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file];
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1;
aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = 1;
}
}
